section.title: Menu Event
section.description: The event on which the menu is displayed.

section.title: On Initialize Javascript
section.description: Define Javascript to run once the Navigation System has been initialized. This Javascript can use the placeholder "{navsys.object}" to get a pointer to the Navigation System object.

section.title: Style
section.description: Style to render the navigation system with.

section.title: Active language
section.description: Specify the active language to use for translatating strings tagged with .. tags. Setting the property here is useful for for testing purposes. In a real application you can set the 'session.__protected__activeLanguage' variable to specify the active language. To select the default language, enter or leave this property blank.

section.title: Security Model
section.description: Choose level-based security for compatibility with versions prior to Version 8. Choose group-based to use the Version 8 and newer web security system.

section.title: Type
section.description: Type of menu node (Link, HTML, Separator). If the menu node has children, then this property is disabled.

section.title: Security Level
section.description: Defines the security level at which the node/branch of the menu is available.

section.title: Security Groups
section.description: Defines the security groups for which the node/branch of the menu is available.

section.title: Show/Hide Expression
section.description: Specify a server-side expression. The expression can use session variables. If the expression evaluates to .t. the menu is included.
